title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about drug shortages, llama antibodies for developing meds, and more
description: The number of ongoing prescription drug shortages rose slightly in the last quarter of 2025, but remained significantly lower than the all-time high reached in 2024
content: The number of ongoing prescription drug shortages rose slightly in the last quarter of 2025, but remained significantly lower than the all-time high reached in 2024
